template.description: created the copy of tested dq pipeline and set pipeline sensitive variables empty
template.name: latest_dq_pipeline

entry.key: Pool - Num Tests Per Eviction Run

value.name: Pool - Num Tests Per Eviction Run

entry.key: Pool - Num Tests Per Eviction Run

entry.value: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ${schema}.dqr_tbl_with_pk_tbl_rec; CREATE TABLE ${schema}.dqr_tbl_with_pk_tbl_rec AS WITH table_with_pk_column AS ( SELECT a.rule_id, a.rule_name, a.connection_id, a.table_name, a.validation_type, a.validation_grp, a.column_name, a.validation_rule, a.condition, a.column_description, a.rule_description, b.column_name AS pk_column FROM dq_checks.dq_rules a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT table_name, column_name FROM dq_checks.dq_rules WHERE validation_rule = 'primary_key_check' ) b ON a.table_name = b.table_name ) SELECT a.*, b.row_count AS total_record_in_table FROM table_with_pk_column a LEFT JOIN ${schema}.table_with_total_count b ON a.table_name = b.table_name;

entry.value: SELECT DISTINCT table_name, (select count(*) from flowfile) total_rules FROM FLOWFILE
select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'dq_checks';

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name, ${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table, '${validation}' as validation_grp, COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness FROM ${table_name} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns FROM ${schema}.merged_result_tbl WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' AND validation_grp = '${validation}' ) AS selected_pk ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name, ${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table, '${validation}' as validation_grp, COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness FROM ${table_name} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns FROM ${schema}.merged_result_tbl WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' AND validation_grp = '${validation}' ) AS selected_pk ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

'Port 'SummeryLoaded'' is invalid because Port has no outgoing connections

entry.value: SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name, ${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table, '${validation}' as validation_grp, COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness FROM ${table_name} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns FROM ${schema}.merged_result_tbl WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' AND validation_grp = '${validation}' ) AS selected_pk ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name, ${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table, '${validation}' as validation_grp, COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness FROM ${table_name} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns FROM ${schema}.merged_result_tbl WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' AND validation_grp = '${validation}' ) AS selected_pk ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name, ${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table, '${validation}' as validation_grp, COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness FROM ${table_name} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns FROM ${schema}.merged_result_tbl WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' AND validation_grp = '${validation}' ) AS selected_pk ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

select count(*) table_remaining from (select table_name, count(distinct validation_grp) cnt from ${schema}.pass_rec_per_table group by table_name) as tbl_grouped where cnt < (select count(distinct validation_grp) from ${schema}.merged_result_tbl);

WITH grped_by_validation AS ( SELECT validation_grp, SUM(total_record_in_table - pass_cnt_for_completeness) AS final_fail_count FROM dq_checks.pass_rec_per_table GROUP BY validation_grp ) SELECT b.run_date, b.run_id, a.validation_grp as validation_group, a.final_fail_count as fail_record_count, (select sum(row_count) from ${schema}.table_with_total_count) as total_record_count FROM grped_by_validation a CROSS JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT run_date, run_id FROM dq_checks.agg_record_tbl ) AS b;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ${schema}.agg_record_tbl;
CREATE TABLE ${schema}.agg_record_tbl AS with agg_records as(select a.*, b.final_failed_record_count as total_record_fail_in_table, c.final_failed_record_count as total_record_fail_in_validation_type, count(case when concatenated_pk_columns != 'no_column' then concatenated_pk_columns else null end) over(partition by rule_id) as total_record_fail_in_rule_id, row_number() over(partition by rule_id) as rnk from ${schema}.merged_result_tbl a left join ${schema}.fail_record_grouped_by_table b on a.table_name = b.table_name left join ${schema}.fail_record_grouped_by_validation c on a.validation_grp = c.validation_grp) select *, (select sum(total_record_fail_in_table) from (select distinct(table_name) table_name, total_record_fail_in_table from agg_records) AS distinct_tbl_fail) AS total_record_fail_for_run_id, (select sum(total_record_in_table) from (select distinct(table_name) table_name, total_record_in_table from agg_records) AS distinct_validation_grp_fail) AS total_record_for_run_id from agg_records where rnk =1;

hii team,
your pipeline for DQ_checks in nifi is completed. summary tables creted in database
thanks Nifi
select rule_id, validation_grp,total_record_fail_in_rule_id as fail_redords from flowfile where total_record_fail_in_rule_id <> 0 and concatenated_pk_columns <> 'no_column'
select DISTINCT run_date,run_id,table_name,total_record_fail_in_table as fail_record_count,total_record_in_table as total_record_count from flowfile
